message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000 to start negotiations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is closer to what I had in mind. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with $16,000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise.
